concept.title: Proxy Endpoint Mapping Rules
concept.shortdesc: Proxy endpoint rules determine which endpoint URL is used, depending on the conditions.

section.title: Overview
section.p: A Proxy can have multiple endpoints; an endpoint can have multiple URLs. You can create rules that choose which URL to redirect the request to, depending on the conditions.

ul.li: A condition can be based on an expression, the existence of a key-value pair in the request header, the HTTP method, the URL path, or the existence of a key-value pair in the query parameters.
You can specify the authentication method and credentials to use at the target URL.
